arabic_text: حمٓ
وَٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
translation: (2) By the clear Book,

arabic_text: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
translation: (3) Indeed, We sent it down during a blessed night.[1459] Indeed, We were to warn [mankind].
footnotes: [1459]- The Night of Decree (Qadr). See Sūrah al-Qadr.

arabic_text: فِيهَا يُفۡرَقُ كُلُّ أَمۡرٍ حَكِيمٍ
translation: (4) Therein [i.e., on that night] is made distinct[1460] every precise matter -
footnotes: [1460]- Or "is separated" or "apportioned," from what is inscribed in the Preserved Slate.  The angels record and descend with whatever Allāh has decreed for the coming year.

arabic_text: أَمۡرٗا مِّنۡ عِندِنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ
translation: (5) [Every] matter [proceeding] from Us. Indeed, We were to send [a messenger]

arabic_text: رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
translation: (6) As mercy from your Lord. Indeed, He is the Hearing, the Knowing,

arabic_text: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
translation: (7) Lord of the heavens and the earth and that between them, if you would be certain.

arabic_text: لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحۡيِۦ وَيُمِيتُۖ رَبُّكُمۡ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
translation: (8) There is no deity except Him; He gives life and causes death. [He is] your Lord and the Lord of your first forefathers.

arabic_text: بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ يَلۡعَبُونَ
translation: (9) But they are in doubt, amusing themselves.

arabic_text: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِي ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٖ مُّبِينٖ
translation: (10) Then watch for the Day when the sky will bring a visible smoke

arabic_text: يَغۡشَى ٱلنَّاسَۖ هَٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
translation: (11) Covering the people; this is a painful torment.

arabic_text: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ
translation: (12) [They will say], "Our Lord, remove from us the torment; indeed, we are believers."

arabic_text: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ وَقَدۡ جَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ مُّبِينٞ
translation: (13) How will there be for them a reminder [at that time]? And there had come to them a clear Messenger.

arabic_text: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوۡاْ عَنۡهُ وَقَالُواْ مُعَلَّمٞ مَّجۡنُونٌ
translation: (14) Then they turned away from him and said, "[He was] taught [and is] a madman."

arabic_text: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ
translation: (15) Indeed, We will remove the torment for a little. Indeed, you [disbelievers] will return [to disbelief].

arabic_text: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
translation: (16) The Day We will strike with the greatest assault, indeed, We will take retribution.

arabic_text: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَجَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ كَرِيمٌ
translation: (17) And We had already tried before them the people of Pharaoh, and there came to them a noble messenger [i.e., Moses],

arabic_text: أَنۡ أَدُّوٓاْ إِلَيَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٞ
translation: (18) [Saying], "Render to me the servants of Allāh.[1461] Indeed, I am to you a trustworthy messenger,"

arabic_text: وَأَن لَّا تَعۡلُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ
translation: (19) And [saying], "Be not haughty with Allāh. Indeed, I have come to you with clear evidence.

arabic_text: وَإِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۡ أَن تَرۡجُمُونِ
translation: (20) And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me.[1462]
footnotes: [1462]- To death.  Or "lest you assault me [with your tongues or harm me otherwise]."

arabic_text: وَإِن لَّمۡ تُؤۡمِنُواْ لِي فَٱعۡتَزِلُونِ
translation: (21) But if you do not believe me, then leave me alone."

arabic_text: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمٞ مُّجۡرِمُونَ
translation: (22) And [finally] he called to his Lord that these were a criminal people.

arabic_text: فَأَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِي لَيۡلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
translation: (23) [Allāh said], "Then set out with My servants by night. Indeed, you are to be pursued.

arabic_text: وَٱتۡرُكِ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ رَهۡوًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّغۡرَقُونَ
translation: (24) And leave the sea in stillness.[1463] Indeed, they are an army to be drowned."
footnotes: [1463]- After it has parted, in order that the soldiers of Pharaoh would follow the Children of Israel and be drowned.

arabic_text: كَمۡ تَرَكُواْ مِن جَنَّٰتٖ وَعُيُونٖ
translation: (25) How much they left behind of gardens and springs

arabic_text: وَزُرُوعٖ وَمَقَامٖ كَرِيمٖ
translation: (26) And crops and noble sites

arabic_text: وَنَعۡمَةٖ كَانُواْ فِيهَا فَٰكِهِينَ
translation: (27) And comfort wherein they were amused.

arabic_text: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَأَوۡرَثۡنَٰهَا قَوۡمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
translation: (28) Thus. And We caused to inherit it another people.

arabic_text: فَمَا بَكَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنظَرِينَ
translation: (29) And the heaven and earth wept not for them, nor were they reprieved.

arabic_text: وَلَقَدۡ نَجَّيۡنَا بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡمُهِينِ
translation: (30) And We certainly saved the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment -

arabic_text: مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ
translation: (31) From Pharaoh. Indeed, he was a haughty one among the transgressors.

arabic_text: وَلَقَدِ ٱخۡتَرۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
translation: (32) And We certainly chose them by knowledge over [all] the worlds.

arabic_text: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٞاْ مُّبِينٌ
translation: (33) And We gave them of signs that in which there was a clear trial.

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَيَقُولُونَ
translation: (34) Indeed, these [disbelievers] are saying,

arabic_text: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا مَوۡتَتُنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
translation: (35) "There is not but our first death, and we will not be resurrected.

arabic_text: فَأۡتُواْ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
translation: (36) Then bring [back] our forefathers, if you should be truthful."

arabic_text: أَهُمۡ خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ قَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ مُجۡرِمِينَ
translation: (37) Are they better or the people of Tubbaʿ[1464] and those before them? We destroyed them, [for] indeed, they were criminals.

arabic_text: وَمَا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَٰعِبِينَ
translation: (38) And We did not create the heavens and earth and that between them in play.

arabic_text: مَا خَلَقۡنَٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
translation: (39) We did not create them except in truth, but most of them do not know.

arabic_text: إِنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ مِيقَٰتُهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
translation: (40) Indeed, the Day of Judgement is the appointed time for them all -

arabic_text: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي مَوۡلًى عَن مَّوۡلٗى شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
translation: (41) The Day when no relation[1465] will avail a relation at all, nor will they be helped -
footnotes: [1465]- i.e., patron, protector or close associate.

arabic_text: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
translation: (42) Except those [believers] on whom Allāh has mercy. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

arabic_text: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
translation: (43) Indeed, the tree of zaqqūm

arabic_text: طَعَامُ ٱلۡأَثِيمِ
translation: (44) Is food for the sinful.

arabic_text: كَٱلۡمُهۡلِ يَغۡلِي فِي ٱلۡبُطُونِ
translation: (45) Like murky oil, it boils within bellies

arabic_text: كَغَلۡيِ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ
translation: (46) Like the boiling of scalding water.

arabic_text: خُذُوهُ فَٱعۡتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
translation: (47) [It will be commanded], "Seize him and drag him into the midst of the Hellfire,

arabic_text: ثُمَّ صُبُّواْ فَوۡقَ رَأۡسِهِۦ مِنۡ عَذَابِ ٱلۡحَمِيمِ
translation: (48) Then pour over his head from the torment of scalding water."

arabic_text: ذُقۡ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡكَرِيمُ
translation: (49) [It will be said], "Taste! Indeed, you are the honored, the noble![1466]
footnotes: [1466]- As he had claimed upon the earth.  He is taunted with these words in Hell as a reminder and additional torment.

arabic_text: إِنَّ هَٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمۡتَرُونَ
translation: (50) Indeed, this is what you used to dispute."

arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي مَقَامٍ أَمِينٖ
translation: (51) Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place:

arabic_text: فِي جَنَّٰتٖ وَعُيُونٖ
translation: (52) Within gardens and springs,

arabic_text: يَلۡبَسُونَ مِن سُندُسٖ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقٖ مُّتَقَٰبِلِينَ
translation: (53) Wearing [garments of] fine silk and brocade, facing each other.

arabic_text: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ
translation: (54) Thus. And We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.

arabic_text: يَدۡعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَٰكِهَةٍ ءَامِنِينَ
translation: (55) They will call therein for every [kind of] fruit - safe and secure.

arabic_text: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِلَّا ٱلۡمَوۡتَةَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
translation: (56) They will not taste death therein except the first death, and He will have protected them from the punishment of Hellfire

arabic_text: فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
translation: (57) As bounty from your Lord. That is what is the great attainment.

arabic_text: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرۡنَٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
translation: (58) And indeed, We have eased it [i.e., the Qur’ān] in your tongue that they might be reminded.

arabic_text: فَٱرۡتَقِبۡ إِنَّهُم مُّرۡتَقِبُونَ
translation: (59) So watch, [O Muḥammad]; indeed, they are watching [for your end].
